CCC10S2P1 - Barking Dogs! (Editorial)

14 Jan 2016
  • Canadian Computing Competition
  • CCC
  • Implementation

This problem asks us to keep track events that come from dogs, over a time interval . Then we must simulate the problem as specified in the statement. One has to be very careful with how they implement this because this problem is very easy to misinterpret or make silly mistakes.

Time complexity:
